Desc.entry: A registered charitable trust that operates a 57' x 14' purpose built community barge for the benefit of all community groups including the very young, the elderly, those with special needs and disabilities. The barge is fitted with hydraulic lifts for wheelchairs, safety rails, accessible toilets, shower units, galley and comfortable bunks for residential passengers. Day trips and 2-5 day residentials are available at any time on the inland waterways of Northern England. Hire fee includes a fully qualified skipper and experienced crew member. The barge is moored at Staniland Marina, Doncaster. Volunteers welcome.

category.entry: CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE - LEISURE ACTIVITIES
